data.persona: I ride in boats to catch fish. I catch fish in the ocean. I usually get a boat full of fish.
data.description:
You are in the Fishing Store.
This store is a small one room stone building with wares laid about on tables.  One can see fishing poles, wooden buckets with dirt and bait inside, along with some mounted trophies.
The mermaid is here.

You are carrying a weights, a coin pouch, and a pouch, wearing a polishing cloths, a shirt, a ceremonial hat, and a boot, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I am searching myself for my coin pouch
data.mid_motivation: I want to buy more bait so I can go fishing today
data.long_motivation: I need to catch a lot of fish and make a lot of money so I can free the mermaid from slavery
